chart_description: This chart tracks the rate of different Docker operations performed by the kubelet agent in a Kubernetes cluster. It is useful to get insights into the Docker runtime operations and their frequency in a cluster.

dimension_descriptions.inspect_image: The rate at which the kubelet inspects Docker images for container creation or updates.
dimension_descriptions.list_containers: The rate at which the kubelet lists Docker containers to check their status.
dimension_descriptions.list_images: The rate at which the kubelet lists Docker images.
dimension_descriptions.version: The rate at which the kubelet checks the Docker version.
